name: InvoiceHeaderExtraction
description: Prompt template for extracting invoice header information from images

template.role: You are an expert in extracting structured data from invoice images.
template.task: Your task is to analyze the provided invoice images and extract key invoice header information.
template.outputFormat:
Respond with a JSON object in the following format: {
  "invoiceNumber": "The invoice number",
  "invoiceDate": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "dueDate": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "totalAmount": 123.45,
  "taxAmount": 23.45,
  "currency": "EUR"
}
